Package com.testpaper.service.impl

Class UserServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.testpaper.service.impl.UserServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserService
@Service public class UserServiceImpl extends Object implements UserService
The UserServiceImpl class implements the UserService interface and provides the implementation for managing user-related operations.

  • Method Details

    • createUser

      public User createUser(User user)
      Creates a new user and saves it in the database. If a user with the same email already exists, a RuntimeException is thrown.
      Specified by:
      createUser in interface UserService
      Parameters:
      user - The user object to create and save.
      Returns:
      The created user object.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if a user with the same email already exists.

    • findByUsername

      public User findByUsername(String username)
      Retrieves a user by their username. If a user with the specified username does not exist, the email is used to search.
      Specified by:
      findByUsername in interface UserService
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user.
      Returns:
      The user object if found, otherwise null.
      See Also:
      • User

    • findByEmail

      public User findByEmail(String email)
      Retrieves a user by their email. If a user with the specified email does not exist, the phone number is used to search.
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the user.
      Returns:
      The user object if found, otherwise null.

    • findByPhoneNo

      public User findByPhoneNo(String phoneNo)
      Retrieves a user by their phone number.
      Parameters:
      phoneNo - The phone number of the user.
      Returns:
      The user object if found, otherwise null.

      Specified by:
      deleteUser in interface UserService
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user to delete.
